::Savanna::

"If you got a handle on things, then I'll be right back."

She walked into the ship and went for an empty chamber.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod yells out.
> "Savanna, get to a CR chamber. I can handle these punks."
> Hot Rod shoots two rockets at Anubis.
